item.title: 本周是有史以来第一只恐龙命名 200 周年纪念日，这只恐龙改变了古生物学领域：巨龙。
item.description:
This week marked the 200th anniversary of the first dinosaur ever named, which changed the field of paleontology: The Megalosaurus. https://t.co/rHcbr1arDF

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 水疗日：在华盛顿州塔科马的迪菲斯角动物园和水族馆里，一只海象一边躺着一边从水管里直接喝水，嘴里发出欢快的口哨声和咕噜声。
item.description:
SPA DAY: A walrus whistled and grunted with happiness as he lounged and chugged water straight from a hose at Point Defiance Zoo & Aquarium in Tacoma, Washington. https://t.co/afGxcc8wZt pic.twitter.com/DEjGxuheOD

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: "病人是第一位的......这个决定有点剥夺了我们的权利"。医生们对阿拉巴马州法院裁决后暂停试管婴儿治疗表示担忧。
item.description:

Physicians share concerns over IVF treatments pausing after Alabama court ruling. https://t.co/39yTY5xpGL

item.title: 最新消息：前总统特朗普在南卡罗来纳州共和党初选中获胜后，尼基-黑莉在向支持者发表讲话时表示，她将 "继续竞选总统"。阅读更多

item.title: 北卡罗来纳州的一位黑人棉农正在努力将棉花与美国黑人之间的痛苦故事转化为对其社区多年来所取得的经济进步的肯定。

item.title: 拯救：在秘鲁坎波韦德的一条高速公路上，一只树懒面临被碾压的危险，被警察救起，并带回灌木丛和树林中。

item.title: 美国军方表示，也门胡塞叛军本月早些时候对一艘悬挂伯利兹国旗的船只发动的袭击造成了长达 18 英里的浮油。美国军方还警告说，船上装载的化肥有泄漏的危险。
item.description:
An attack by Yemeni Houthi rebels on a Belize-flagged ship earlier this month caused an 18-mile oil slick, the U.S. military said. It also warned of the danger of a spill from the vessel's cargo of fertilizer. https://t.co/IWKoqDW5qY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 密西西比州官员称，两名国民警卫队队员周五在密西西比州的一次例行训练飞行中乘坐的军用直升机坠毁，造成两人死亡。密西西比州州长说，两人都在位于图佩罗的密西西比国民警卫队陆军航空支援设施服役。
item.description:
Two National Guardsmen are dead after their military helicopter crashed in Mississippi during a routine training flight on Friday, officials said. Both served at a Mississippi National Guard Army aviation support facility in Tupelo, the governor said.https://t.co/zhfNbsG68K pic.twitter.com/TJIXTauXdC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 新公布的录像显示，非二元制青少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在高中发生肢体冲突一天后死亡，她描述了导致打架的原因。

item.title: 英国执政党保守党在一名议员指责伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）受伊斯兰教徒控制后，暂停了与该议员的联系，以色列-哈马斯战争引发的紧张局势令英国政坛动荡不安。
item.description:
The U.K.’s governing Conservative Party has suspended ties with one if its lawmakers after he accused London Mayor Sadiq Khan of being controlled by Islamists, as tensions over the Israel-Hamas war roil British politics. https://t.co/kwuLEGqKgv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在巴黎农业博览会（Paris Agricultural Fair）开幕式上遭到了愤怒的农民们的嘘声和口哨声，他们指责马克龙在支持农民方面做得不够。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron has been greeted with boos and whistles at the opening of the Paris Agricultural Fair by angry farmers who blame him for not doing enough to support them. https://t.co/JAo71bRt4Y

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024
